Question: AR Genie CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AR Genie

Product 1

- Augmented Reality capabilities
- Generative AI technology
- Computer Vision and L.L.M Technology integration
- HD in-glass display for gaming and movies
- Showcased at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
